products.title: Oslo Blackout Black Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Oslo Blackout Black Roller Blind in Black. Made to measure from £7.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, bold and cohesive, our Oslo Blackout Black roller blind blends minimal style with practical design.  A firm favourite, our Oslo Blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - Whether its blackout roller blinds in the bedroom,  in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. 
 
At Swift Direct Blind, quality comes first.  Our roller blinds are expertly cut and assembled by our roller blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do our blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.

products.productdescription:
The Velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.

 	Installs in minutes.
